house_listing.house_description: This 2 level detached single family home built in 1975 has 5 bedroom(s), 3.5 bath(s) , 2 car garage and approximately 2965 square feet of living area. Rooms include dining room, family room, living room, master bedroom. Features include view, patio, fireplace.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Dining Room, Family Room, Living Room, Master Bedroom
